pkgmetadata.longdescription: Patches to Use 'dplyr' on Remote Data Sources // Patches to use 'dplyr' on remote data sources ('SQL' databases, 'Spark' 2.0.0 and above) in a reliable "generic" fashion (generic meaning user code works similarly on all such sources, without needing per-source adaption). Due to the fluctuating nature of 'dplyr'/'dbplyr'/'rlang' 'APIs' this package is going into maintenance mode. Most of the 'replyr' functions are now done better by one of the non-monolithic replacement packages: 'wrapr', 'seplyr', 'rquery', or 'cdata'.
